results.title: ‘Parentese’ Is Truly a Lingua Franca, Global Study Finds
results.abstract: In an ambitious cross-cultural study, researchers found that adults around the world speak and sing to babies in similar ways.

results.title: Paul Sorvino, Master of the Mild-Mannered Mobster, Dies at 83
results.abstract: A would-be singing star, he found success in Hollywood playing a variety of roles, but they were often quiet, dangerous men, like Paulie Cicero in “Goodfellas.”

media.caption: Mr. Sorvino with Ray Liotta in a scene from Martin Scorsese’s mob epic “Goodfellas” in 1990. Mr. Sorvino almost abandoned the role.
